bibl.title: Callicrates of Samos. A Contribution to the Study of the Ptolemaic Admiralty. With a Samian Inscription published in Appendix by Günter Dunst.
bibl.seg: Hauben Hans, Callicrates of Samos. A Contribution to the Study of the Ptolemaic Admiralty. With a Samian Inscription published in Appendix by Günter Dunst. (Studia Hellenistica. 18.)
Louvain, Publications Universitaires, 1970, 8°, 86 pp. et 1 pl.

C.R. par Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 49 (1969) p. 260. - Harry J. Dell, AJP 95 (1974) pp. 189-191. - Anna Swiderek, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 302-304. - Fritz Uebel, ArchPF 22-23 (1974) pp. 319-320. - Claude Wehrli, ChrEg 45 (1970) No. 90, pp. 403-404. - Édouard Will, REG 84 (1971) pp. 178-179.
